recommended_degree: Pendidikan Teknologi Informatika dan Komputer, Teknologi Rekayasa Perangkat Lunak (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
- Work with software engineers to help design, build, and improve applications.
- Team up with other departments and project managers to plan app solutions.
- Learn and follow the software development process and help improve it when possible.
- Be open to learning from mentors and growing your technical skills.
-Stay updated on new technology and share ideas or suggestions when needed.
